env.info: (hold 0) (plate 15) (at 0 5) (sort 1 worktable) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 closet) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (type 2 container) (closed 2) (sort 3 microwave) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (opened 3) (sort 4 plant) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 sofa) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 human) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 teapoy) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (sort 8 can) (size 8 small) (color 8 red) (inside 8 2) (sort 9 can) (size 9 small) (color 9 green) (at 9 4) (sort 10 can) (size 10 small) (color 10 black) (inside 10 3) (sort 11 can) (size 11 small) (color 11 white) (at 11 7) (sort 12 bottle) (size 12 small) (color 12 red) (sort 13 bottle) (size 13 small) (color 13 blue) (sort 14 book) (size 14 small) (color 14 red) (sort 15 book) (size 15 small) (color 15 yellow)

test.instr: (:ins (:cons_not (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red)))) (:cons_not (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black)))) (:cons_not (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white)))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y worktable))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X teapoy))) (:task (pickup X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y teapoy))) (:task (pickup X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y teapoy))) )
test.nl: The green can must not be on plate. There must not be a black can on plate. There must not be a white can on plate. Give human a can. Put the can on worktable. Go to teapoy. pick the green can up. pick the black can up.
